channel.title: C# on Nick Fisher's tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in C# on Nick Fisher's tech blog

item.title: How to Set Up ClickOnce Continuous Deployment for WPF via Nginx
item.description: I've been working on a small wpf project on GitHub that let's you view SEC filings on your desktop in an intuitive way. Since EDGAR kind of sucks for a casual user, this is much more appealing.

item.title: How to Configure Visual Studio to Implement the Yarn Package Manager
item.description: The old recommended way of getting packages like bootstrap and jquery easily into a project was to use bower. That was convenient to add packages for projects where you were planning on providing mostly server-side functionality, and could use bootstrap to handle page styling, for example.

item.title: How To Make a Basic Working Contact Form With ASP .NET Core MVC and MailKit
item.description: Modern day website owners prefer not to leave their email address open and exploitable on the internet. Enter the Contact page, which will usually have some basic fields for the visitor of the site to fill out like Name, Email Address, Phone, and Message to send to someone who can help them out.
